product_name: prAna Bedford Canyon Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Casual and made for everyday living, the women's prAna Bedford Canyon Pants offer breathable, stretch organic cotton and a soft, brushed finish for comfort. Organic cotton offers breathable comfort and easy care, and is grown without the use of toxic pesticides. Touch of spandex offers stretch so you move with ease in the prAna Bedford Canyon Pants. 5-pocket style with rivets; printed fabric inside waistband; standard fit. Closeout.
short_description: Casual and made for everyday living, the women's prAna Bedford Canyon Pants offer breathable, stretch organic cotton and a soft, brushed finish for comfort.
